commutative, i.e., AB̸= BA; see also Figure 2.5 for an illustration.
Deﬁnition 2.2 (Identity Matrix). In Rn×n, we deﬁne the identity matrix
identity matrix
In :=



0 1 ··· 0 ··· 0
... ... ... ... ... ...

... ... ... ... ... ...
0 0 ··· 0 ··· 1

